title: I'm using pixel3 and " my apps & games" no longer shows also having error chenking for updates.
content: I'm using most up-to -date system android 11 and the security. It used to show all the apps i'm using from the phone also provide update or autoupdate. Now it just doesn't show any of it anymore and I have to look for update manunally going into playstore and search to update the apps i'm using.
